2024 年 4 月 4 日星期四 20:01:16 +0000每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到 TED 演讲，这些演讲激发、激发和激发了一些世界领先的思想家和实干家的想象力，他们在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地的合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到 TED 演讲，这些演讲激发、激发和激发了一些世界领先的思想家和实干家的想象力，他们在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地的合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
植根于古代设计的拉丁美洲未来主义愿景 |卡塔利娜·洛特罗卡塔利娜·洛特罗What would Latin America look like if colonization hadn't interrupted its ancient civilizations? Imagining a future where ancestral knowledge intertwines with modern aesthetics, designer Catalina Lotero shows how "pre-Columbian futurism" draws inspiration from Indigenous symbolism and technology — empowering Latin America to reclaim lost cultural narratives.植根于古代设计的拉丁美洲未来主义愿景 |卡塔利娜·洛特罗What would Latin America look like if colonization hadn't interrupted its ancient civilizations? 如何识别邪教组织 |萨拉·埃德蒙森萨拉·埃德蒙森Nobody joins a cult on purpose, says Sarah Edmondson, a former member of the infamous Nxivm cult and one of the three whistleblowers that led to its downfall. She explains how she got ensnared in this highly manipulative group — and then escaped it — and shares red flags to help you distinguish between a cult and a safe community.如何识别邪教组织 |萨拉·埃德蒙森Nobody joins a cult on purpose, says Sarah Edmondson, a former member of the infamous Nxivm cult and one of the three whistleblowers that led to its downfall. 想在商业上取得成功吗？找到需要解决的问题 |安东尼·谭 (Anthony Tan) 和阿曼·丹诺尼 (Amane Dannouni)安东尼·谭 (Anthony Tan) 和阿曼·丹诺尼 (Amane Dannouni) Anthony Tan — the CEO of Grab, Southeast Asia's leading super-app — talks about launching a business that not only turns a profit but also helps people and the environment. In conversation with digital strategist Amane Dannouni, Tan discusses the design choices and tension points of running such a company and why it's something every entrepreneur should consider doing.想在商业上取得成功吗？找到需要解决的问题 |安东尼·谭 (Anthony Tan) 和阿曼·丹诺尼 (Amane Dannouni) Anthony Tan — the CEO of Grab, Southeast Asia's leading super-app — talks about launching a business that not only turns a profit but also helps people and the environment. 中年时性会发生什么？看看“卧室间隙”|玛丽亚·索福克勒斯玛丽亚·索福克勒斯Menopause isn't just hot flashes, says gynecologist and sexual medicine specialist Maria Sophocles. It's often accompanied by overlooked symptoms like painful sex or loss of libido. Shedding light on what she calls the "bedroom gap," or the difference in sexual expectations of men and women in midlife due to societal norms, Sophocles advocates for education, medical advancement and a new understanding of menopause — because sex should be pleasurable and comfortable for everyone.中年时性会发生什么？看看“卧室间隙”|玛丽亚·索福克勒斯Menopause isn't just hot flashes, says gynecologist and sexual medicine specialist Maria Sophocles. It's often accompanied by overlooked symptoms like painful sex or loss of libido. Shedding light on what she calls the "bedroom gap," or the difference in sexual expectations of men and women in midlife due to societal norms, Sophocles advocates for education, medical advancement and a new understanding of menopause — because sex should be pleasurable and comfortable for everyone. https://www.ted.com/talks/maria_sophocles_what_happens_to_sex_in_midlife_a_look_at_the_bedroom_gap?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:127715 127715 Tue, 02 Apr 2024 14:50:04 +0000高等教育不00:14:11泰德
一位喜剧演员讲述如何拯救民主 |乔丹·克莱珀乔丹·克莱珀Conversation is a battlefield with only one winner. Or is it? Comedian and author Jordan Klepper believes we can get better at talking to each other (and perhaps save democracy) by learning how to lose.一位喜剧演员讲述如何拯救民主 |乔丹·克莱珀Conversation is a battlefield with only one winner. 中国煤炭开采的人力成本|王晓君王晓君Xiaojun "Tom" Wang grew up in the Chinese province of Shanxi, the world's largest coal producer. Each year, more than a billion tons of coal are dug out of Shanxi's mountains, and the impacts are devastating — from massive landslides to damaged cultural sites and threats to human health. Wang illuminates the need for sustainable alternatives to protect the environment and ancestral homes, underscoring the rich heritage and untapped potential of provinces like his own.中国煤炭开采的人力成本|王晓君Xiaojun "Tom" Wang grew up in the Chinese province of Shanxi, the world's largest coal producer. Each year, more than a billion tons of coal are dug out of Shanxi's mountains, and the impacts are devastating — from massive landslides to damaged cultural sites and threats to human health. Wang illuminates the need for sustainable alternatives to protect the environment and ancestral homes, underscoring the rich heritage and untapped potential of provinces like his own. https://www.ted.com/talks/xiaojun_tom_wang_the_ human_cost_of_coal_mining_in_china?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:127268 127268 Fri, 29 Mar 2024 14:45:34 +0000高等教育不00:14:03泰德
如何忍受经济末日？菲利普·卡尔森-斯勒扎克菲利普·卡尔森-斯勒扎克Economic crises can and do happen. But for every true crisis, there are many false alarms, says economist Philipp Carlsson-Szlezak. He explains how to live with the media's pervasive economic doomsaying, why we should stop treating financial forecasts like a precise science — and what we should embrace instead.如何忍受经济末日？菲利普·卡尔森-斯勒扎克Economic crises can and do happen. But for every true crisis, there are many false alarms, says economist Philipp Carlsson-Szlezak. 邀请您帮助建设可持续的未来 |吉姆·斯纳布吉姆·斯纳布"If we want to avoid a climate disaster, we need much more radical leadership," says Jim Snabe, who knows a thing or two about leadership as chairman of the world's largest maritime shipping company. In a stirring talk, he encourages companies to take big, bold actions to tackle climate change — and invites anyone to join the TED Future Forum, a new initiative focused on the role of business in advancing solutions to the climate crisis.邀请您帮助建设可持续的未来 |吉姆·斯纳布"If we want to avoid a climate disaster, we need much more radical leadership," says Jim Snabe, who knows a thing or two about leadership as chairman of the world's largest maritime shipping company. 让你的花园狂野起来 |丽贝卡·麦克麦金丽贝卡·麦克麦金Many gardeners work hard to maintain clean, tidy environments ... which is the exact opposite of what wildlife wants, says ecological horticulturist Rebecca McMackin. She shows the beauty of letting your garden run wild, surveying the success she's had increasing biodiversity even in the middle of New York City — and offers tips for cultivating a garden that can be home to birds, bees, butterflies and more.让你的花园狂野起来 |丽贝卡·麦克麦金Many gardeners work hard to maintain clean, tidy environments ... which is the exact opposite of what wildlife wants, says ecological horticulturist Rebecca McMackin. 为什么我们还没有更好的机器人？ |肯·戈德堡肯·戈德堡Why hasn't the dream of having a robot at home to do your chores become a reality yet?
